name: Twisted Ham and Turkey Grilled Cheese
author: Kristin Licavoli
summary: This recipe combines honey turkey and ham, red onion, tomatoes, fresh corn on the cob, 4 kinds of cheese, and is made using mayo and butter to brown. A unique sandwich. Feel free to add a Mexican twist using cilantro and peppers! Serve with tomato soup.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste
directions: Mix corn kernels with 1 teaspoon butter, salt, and pepper in a small bowl
Spread 1/2 teaspoon butter and 1/2 teaspoon mayonnaise over 1 bread slice; flip
Layer honey ham, turkey ham, Lacy Swiss cheese, Amish Swiss cheese, American cheese, and Cheddar cheese on top
Cover with corn mixture, tomato, sweet onion, and green onion
Cover with second slice of bread
Spread remaining 1/2 teaspoon butter and 1/2 teaspoon mayonnaise on the outside
Preheat a skillet over medium-low heat
Cook sandwich until cheeses melt and bread turns golden brown, about 6 minutes per side
